Hello, My Name Is Arif Nazir

Arif Nazir

A professional Backender


I am an ambitious and solution-oriented software developer, well-versed in latest technologies with focus on Cloud and Mobility solutions with various cloud providers. I have multiple years of software development experience in Enterprise Mobility Management, eCommerce and Digital Media domains. Keen on learning new technologies and keeping up the pace with advancements in Enterprise Mobility, Mobile App Development and Cloud Native software development. A people's person, team-player and loves to lead from the front.


I help businesses develop and level-up enterprise software solutions.
